info.title: Traveling Merchant
info.description: A back end application to keep track of transactions of a merchant buying product and selling product and keeping track of their inventory. All succesful operations start with "Merchant: {merchantId}" where merchantId is the id of the merchant that is logged in.

servers.description: The application's URL is randomized after every initialization through its port number represented in the URL as {PORT}.

/api-docs.description: This path is used to view the api documentation using swagger.

get.description: This path uses the GET operation to view api documentation.

The only response.value: This is not the acutal response. This directs to view the api documenation page.

/login.description: This path is used to log into the application.

get.description: This route is empty right now but its future purpose is to load the login page.

post.description: This path uses the POST operation to log into the application. On succesful operation a csrf token is returned to use into request headers for csrf protected routes.

requestBody.description: Client using app needs merchant credentials to login.

Client tries to login with wrong usernam.value: Merchant: 1 has made to many request to the original url, /login, next retry is after 86400 seconds.

Client tries to login with wrong passwor.value: Merchant: 1 has made to many request to the original url, /login, next retry is after 3600 seconds.

/logout.description: This path is used to log out the application.

get.description: This route is empty right now but its future purpose is to load the logout page.

post.description: This path uses the POST operation to log out the application.

/merchant/{merchantId}.description: This path is used update or get the information of the merchant.

get.description: This path uses get to get the information of the merchant.

put.description: This path uses the PUT operation to update information of the merchant.

requestBody.description: Merchant credentials and new merchant credentials

Merchant found given merchant id.value: Merchant: 1 has updated either/both their username or password.

/clients/{clientId}.summary: Request for a specific client's data
/clients/{clientId}.description: This path used to perform CRUD operations on clients

get.description: This path uses the GET operation to get specific clients.

200.description: OK, returns client data with associated work, and tickets.

requestBody.description: Client new information. phoneNumber must be written with parenthesis and dashes ((XXX)XXX-XXXX), just dashes (XXX-XXX-XXXX), or all together (XXXXXXXXXX).
